description: A thin, and slender mace of unknown origin designed to be as deadly as possible, lodged inside your arm. When taken out, it can only be held at the right hand as it cannot be removed from the user as the pommel is secured by superalloy wires. How does it fit inside? Does it bend? You will never find out...
An extremely lightweight fancy arm augmentation that is quite famous for its brutality and efficiency.
A customized metal arm that replaces your right arm, it is strange however that this new arm of yours feels very sturdy, but hallow at the same time. Perhaps something is inside...

A fancy metal arm replacement often used by police enforcers, cqc enthusiasts, and some... unsavory individuals. This however only has one arm and the other one is missing, it is safe to assume that this one is heavily modified and dangerous.
A customized metal arms that completely replaces your arms. Extremely lightweight, sturdy and agile. Still needs constant supply of electricity to use properly.
A fancy metal arm replacement often used by police enforcers, cqc enthusiasts, and some... unsavory individuals.
